event.title: Let's celebrate I Love Free Software Day in Bonn, Germany

body.p: We are a group of Free Software enthusiasts who meet in Bonn once a month to share ideas and talk about our experience related to Free Software (also known as Open Source).
Everyone is welcome to join! Our Bonn FSFE community meetings usually take place at 7 PM (CET) every second Monday of the month. We currently meet at bitcircus101, Dorotheenstra√üe 101, 53113 Bonn
On this special day we celebrate the I Love Free Software Day with friends from OpenCloud, Plone and Bonn.digital
